did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Retail, Wholesale and Department Store Employees. Film, 1948.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Martin P. Catherwood Library, Cornell University.
did.abstract: A black and white silent motion picture of the 1948 organizing of the union at Famous Barr, a May Department Store, in St. Louis, Missouri.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: A ten-minute black and white silent motion picture of the 1948 organizing of the union at Famous Barr, a May Department Store, in St. Louis, Missouri.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
